title: Disney's Storybook Collection
description: Experience the wonder of Disney classics in this collection of 23 of the best-loved stories of all time. These short, easy-to-read retellings of classic Disney films will entertain little ones both day and night!Contents: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs -- Pinocchio -- Bambi -- Cinderella -- Alice in Wonderland -- Peter Pan -- Lady and the Tramp -- Sleeping Beauty -- 101 Dalmatians -- The Jungle Book -- The Aristocats -- Mickey's Christmas Carol -- Oliver & Company -- The Prince and the Pauper -- The Little Mermaid -- Beauty and the Beast -- Aladdin -- The Lion King -- Pocahontas -- The Hunchback of Notre Dame -- Hercules -- Mickey and the Beanstalk -- Three Little Pigs
author: Nancy Parent
